faqs.question: Do I need to register to participate in auctions?
faqs.answer: Only approved company representatives can place bids in auctions. Private individuals can either submit a car without registering or register as sellers to manage and track their listings.

faqs.question: How do I submit my car for auction?
faqs.answer: You can submit a car by filling out a short form—no account required. For more control, like tracking submission status or managing multiple listings, you can also register as a seller.

faqs.question: Who can place bids on auctions?
faqs.answer: Only representatives of verified companies can bid. Companies must submit valid organization licenses. After approval, they can register internal users to bid on their behalf.

faqs.question: How will I know if I’ve won an auction?
faqs.answer: If your bid wins, you’ll receive an email notification with details about the auction and contact information for the seller.

faqs.question: Is there a fee to list my car for auction?
faqs.answer: No, listing a car for auction is completely free. We aim to keep the process simple and accessible for all users.

faqs.question: Is payment handled through the website?
faqs.answer: No, our platform does not process payments. Once an auction ends, buyers and sellers receive each other's contact information to complete the transaction independently.
